thread.section_title: Holisticshop.co.uk Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.holisticshop.co.uk
thread.title: Claire G

author: Claire G
title: Claire G
text: I've been very impressed with the service at Holistic Shop.co.uk. I found what I was looking for quickly and at a competitive price. What I really liked was the way the postage is calculated so fairly and transparently - updating as soon as items were added or removed from the basket. Once I continued through the simple and straightforward payment process, I was surprised to see my parcel dispatched the same day and arrive the following day. The items were well packed and of a good quality, but it was the ease and speed of the service that really led me to write a review. In this age of online shopping when some of the biggest retailers (a certain sports company comes to mind) can take 5-10 days to even consider despatching your parcel, Holistic Shop.co.uk are a refreshing change. I will certainly not hesitate to use this online store in the future.
